data.eml:eml: A new species of Pseudomegischus van Achterberg from China, with a key to the species (Hymenoptera, Stephanidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Jiang-Li, Fan, Xu-Lei, van Achterberg, Cornelis, Li, Tao (2015): A new species of Pseudomegischus van Achterberg from China, with a key to the species (Hymenoptera, Stephanidae). ZooKeys 537: 103-110, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.537.6592, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.537.6592
